description: Erection of a rear extension at first floor level, over part of the existing two storey back addition; installation of 3no. rooflights in the front roofslope; further excavation of the front garden, in connection with the creation of a WC and boot room; installation of a new door and a window following the removal of existing doors, to the side elevation at lower ground floor level (boot room); erection of new dormer French doors and a Juliette balcony following the removal of an existing dormer window, and alterations to existing dormer window to include installation of an enlarged window to replace existing, to the rear elevation of rear mansard roof extension; installation of an enlarged rooflight to replace existing, on top of the flat roof of existing four storey back addition; alterations to fenestration to the rear elevation at ground and lower ground floor level to include, installation of new sliding doors and windows, alterations to existing balustrade, and erection of new external staircase following the removal of existing spiral staircase; installation of an enlarged rooflight to replace existing, on top of the flat roof of lower ground floor back addition; repositioning of external steps, and landscaping of the rear garden.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
